original_text: Many people then put their coats down on the road. Other people cut branches down from trees in the fields. They put the branches down on the road as well.
korean_text: 많은 사람들은 자기들의 겉옷을, 또 다른 이들은 들에서 벤 나뭇가지를 길에 펴며

sentences.original_text: Many people then put their coats down
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 그때 그들의 겉옷을 내려놓았다

sentences.original_text: They put the branches down on the road as well
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 가지들을 길 위에 내려놓았다
